snippet.title: Fading Skies - Re-Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Hi everyone. We’re back!
After the positive reception of our initial concept trailer for Fading Skies, we wanted to make sure we get this thing right before showing off more. Did it take us longer than anticipated? Yes. Much longer? Sure. Much, much, MUCH longer? Well, the important part is, we finally got there! After rebuilding pretty much the whole game from the ground up, we’re happy with how it looks, how it feels to play, and how the story plays out. 

We're not ready for release just yet, but we have a clear road ahead of us, and a playable demo coming later this year.

We’ve been pouring our hearts and souls into this project and hope some of that comes across. If you liked the trailer, we’d be grateful for any like, subscribe, share, and wishlist on Steam!

► *Wishlist on Steam:* https://store.steampowered.com/app/2809200/Fading_Skies/

► *Discord:* https://discord.gg/jk7HbYs2Cf
► *Newsletter:* https://fadingskies.com/
► *Twitter:* https://twitter.com/FadingSkiesGame
► *Facebook:* https://www.facebook.com/FadingSkiesGame

*About Fading Skies:*
A story-driven action-adventure, blending elements of classic 3D platformers and modern action-RPGs. 
Explore a vivid fantasy world full of mystery, memorable characters, and heartfelt narrative. Unlock the powerful abilities of Ryn and her dragon companion, as you join her quest to stop the planet’s collapse. Only by confronting the shadows of her forgotten past can the future be saved.
